prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Galley Proofs, Accession #7550-b , Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was given to the Library on April 4, 1990.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of an incomplete galley proof of Confusion,1924, and a bound galley proof of Cozzens' book of short stories, Children and Others,published in 1964.

did.unittitle: Incomplete Galley Proofs of Confusionby James Gould Cozzens 1924

scopecontent.p: published by B.J. Brimmer Company, pages 269-404

did.unittitle: Advanced Uncorrected Bound Galley Proofs of Children and Othersby James Gould Cozzens 1964
